briefTitle: 6-week Trial of the Efficacy and Safety of Asenapine Compared to Placebo in Participants With an Acute Exacerbation of Schizophrenia (P06124)
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Randomized, Double-blind, Fixed-dose, 6-week Trial of the Efficacy and Safety of Asenapine Compared With Placebo in Subjects With an Acute Exacerbation of Schizophrenia (Phase 3)
summary: A multicenter, randomized, parallel-group, double-blind, fixed dose, 6-week trial of the efficacy and safety of asenapine compared with placebo in participants with an acute exacerbation of schizophrenia.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Positive and Negative Syndrome Scale (PANSS) Total Score.
